select m.device_code, m.device_name, u.id as device_user_id, um.name, um.sex, um.id_card, um.tel, IF(SUBSTRING(um.id_card, -1) = 'X', '女', IF(CAST(SUBSTRING(um.id_card, 18, 1) AS SIGNED) % 2 = 1, '男', '女')) as gender, h.person from device_management m left join device_user u on m.id = u.device_id and m.delete_flag = u.delete_flag left join user_management um on u.user_id = um.id and u.delete_flag = um.delete_flag left join device_heartbeat h on m.id = h.device_id and m.delete_flag = h.delete_flag where m.delete_flag = false and u.is_his = false
and m.device_name like '%${dto.deviceName}%'
and m.device_code like '%${dto.deviceCode}%'
and h.person = #{dto.state}
